We are a multi-faceted organization built to advance biopharma innovation from discovery to market. Through our integrated model of strategic advisory and venture investing, we provide the essential capital and expertise that pioneering companies need to succeed.

Our Pillars:

Zelaris Advisory: Your strategic compass for high-stakes operational decisions.

Zelaris Ventures: Identifying and fueling the next generation of life science leaders.

settings.heading: Zelaris Group is a holding company for a suite of businesses dedicated to advancing the life sciences ecosystem.

settings.text:
We are a multi-faceted organization built to advance biopharma innovation from discovery to market. Through our integrated model of strategic advisory and venture investing, we provide the essential capital and expertise that pioneering companies need to succeed.

Our Value-Add
We provide deep strategic support in:

  • Business Development & Partnership Strategy.
  • Operational Road-mapping.
  • Manufacturing and Supply Chain Strategy (CDMO Navigator).
Your strategic compass for high-stakes operational decisions.
Identifying and fueling the next generation of life science leaders.

settings.title: Build
settings.text: Your pitch deck is your only life line when you send it out to investors. Create a compelling story in the language investors understand. Capture maximum value of each slide deck by using state of the art slide designs, and optimize your strategy to resonate with investors, by using effective key words and phrases.

settings.title: Learn
settings.text: We coach and guide you through your first and subsequent pitches to investors. We stay with you to hear investor feedbacks, and optimize your deck to meet specific investors' expectations. We enable you to see blind spots that hinder your progress.

settings.title: Connect
settings.text: The hardest part of fundraising is to put yourself in front of relevant investors. You do not want to meet just any investor, you must be selective and informed about which investors are a fit to fund your startup. We have got you covered. Learn about how you can access our community of investors and innovators.

settings.title: Who We are
settings.section_para: Zelaris Ventures are founders are seasoned entrepreneurs, industry executives and investors. They understand the pain points of brilliant innovators who are launching and growing their startups. Zelaris Ventures was created to democratize information and capital and direct it to fuel innovation at a global scale. Together, we can disrupt the current business model of scaling innovations into thriving businesses.

settings.tab_content: One 1:1 meeting per month (minimum) with our consultants to understand your needs and give you feedback as you grow your startup
An intensive live and interactive online tutorial. You will learn how to write an investor pitch deck and confidently pitch your startup to investors.
Attend live panels and interviews with VC leaders, where you get a chance to ask questions and engage in discussions. Have access to a network of innovators and investors.
Receive articles and latest updates on innovation and investing via our periodical publications and social media updates.

settings.paragraph: It’s not enough to say that our team of experts and consultants has satisfied over 3000 clients from different industries. Hear what they are saying.

settings.question: How does your pitch deck building work?
settings.answer:
We start by providing you with a PowerPoint template that covers "must have" information. We work with you interactively to populate the deck in your own words and guide you to build an outstanding pitch deck.

The deck template will cover the following:

  • Introduction Of Business Model
  • Market Size, TAM, SOM, SAM
  • Founding team background
  • Problem Statement & Solution
  • Business & Revenue Model
  • Roadmap, Timelines Milestones for The Organization
  • Competitive Landscape
  • Intellectual Property
  • Traction, Strategic partnerships
  • Financial Projections, budgeting
  • Valuation Model Buidling
  • Risk Mitigation Strategy & SWOT Analysis
  • Investment amount needed and how it will be spent
  • Exit Strategy
  • Conclusion

settings.question: Is my information confidential?
settings.answer: Yes. Confidentiality and data security are given top priority. We have an optional non-disclosure agreement (NDA) in place and your information is stored in locked and secure in the cloud.

settings.question: How long will it take to complete my deck?
settings.answer: That all depends how much time you are willing to invest. However, we recommend allocating 15-30 hours and keep optimizing it as you get feedback from investors.

settings.question: Will you treat my presentation as confidential?
settings.answer: Yes. Confidentiality and data security are given top priority at Pitch Deck Services. Your account manager advises you with respect to an optional non-disclosure agreement (NDA).

settings.question: Do I need a credit card to use PDS?
settings.answer: We accept payments through Credit/Debit cards and Paypal on our website. If you want to pay with another option, kindly get in touch with us.

settings.question: When do your online tutorials Start?
settings.answer: Our online tutorials start the first Monday of each Month and are broken down into different sections over a course of a month. The tutorials are recorded if you are not able to make it to the live class.

settings.question: I live outside of the US. Can I still access your services?
settings.answer: Yes. We intentionally focus on serving emerging markets as we understand it is the future of the next gen economic power. Whether you are based in Latin America, Africa or Asia, we invite you to join us and be part of our exciting journey in empowering global innovators.
